title: How to find your followers and friends on Mastodon
description: People leaving Twitter for Mastodon may find it harder to find friends and followers there. Here's what you need to know to simplify the process.

title: I bought this plastic-welding tool that TikTok suggested. Did the algorithm get it right?
description: Social media has been bombarding me with videos of welders that promise to fix broken plastic, so I bit. Here's what I learned after doing so.

title: Photoshop free trial: How to get it and what to know
description: Adobe Photoshop is the go-to photo-editing program for many, but membership can be expensive. Here's the one (and only) way to use the service for free.

title: Siphon-brewing coffee looks like alchemy, but it makes the best cup of joe
description: The Tiger Siphonysta makes siphon-brewing easy, and my coffee-loving wife couldn't be happier with it.
